name: The labyrinth (itch) (zac112)
description:
Adventure into the depths of the Labyrinth. Go at it solo or enlist friends to help you map out the maze. 

Submission for the Together game jam 2021

Made by

ceTJa (Graphics, plot)
Enildor (Graphics)
Erno Lokkila (Programming)
Mai Kurunsaari (Graphics)
